title: Next-Generation Device Regulations
description:
This module involves supervised self-study in the field of
medical device regulatory science. The work will typically
entails the assignment of medical devices developed using
novel advanced technologies so that the student will spend
the semester to explore the challenges of regulation of
such devices and to develop innovative framework
requirement for regulatory approval. During the course, the
student will be presented with different confronted with
scenarios including product design failure, clinical trials
mishaps, IP issues, manufacturing non-compliance. These
scenarios present to the student real-life case studies that
challenges the student ability to solve/remedy the
problems.
